thread.title: BRIEF-CNH Industrial announces retiree benefits alignment following favorable U.S. supreme court ruling

title: BRIEF-CNH Industrial announces retiree benefits alignment following favorable U.S. supreme court ruling
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Cnh Industrial:
* CNH INDUSTRIAL ANNOUNCES RETIREE BENEFITS ALIGNMENT FOLLOWING FAVORABLE U.S. SUPREME COURT RULING
* BENEFITS MODIFICATIONS ARE ESTIMATED TO RESULT IN A REDUCTION OF PLAN LIABILITY BY APPROXIMATELY $500 MILLION TO $550 MILLION
* THE BENEFITS MODIFICATIONS TO REALIZE A CORRESPONDING PRE-TAX INCOME
* UNDER IFRS, THIS PRE-TAX INCOME WILL BE RECORDED IN Q2 OF 2018 IN ITS ENTIRETY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
